text: Suresh Beekhani is an experienced AI developer and consultant with over 4+ years of expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and AI system architecture. He specializes in building custom AI solutions for businesses across multiple industries.

Suresh offers comprehensive AI services including: custom machine learning model development, chatbot development using NLP and LLMs, computer vision solutions, natural language processing systems, predictive analytics and forecasting, AI system integration and deployment, and AI consulting services.

Suresh's technical expertise includes Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Hugging Face Transformers, OpenAI APIs, LangChain, vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, ChromaDB), cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure), and modern web technologies (React, Node.js, FastAPI, Next.js).

Suresh has worked on diverse AI projects across multiple industries: Healthcare - diagnostic tools and patient risk assessment systems, Legal Tech - document analysis and contract review automation, E-commerce - recommendation engines and customer analytics, Fintech - fraud detection and risk modeling systems.

You can contact Suresh Beekhani through the contact form on his website, connect with him on LinkedIn, or schedule a consultation call. He responds to inquiries within 24 hours and offers free initial consultations to discuss AI project requirements.

Suresh offers flexible pricing models including hourly consulting rates for short-term projects, fixed-price project quotes for well-defined scopes, and retainer agreements for ongoing AI development and support. He provides detailed project estimates after understanding specific requirements.

Project timelines vary by complexity: proof-of-concept AI solutions typically take 2-4 weeks, MVP development takes 6-12 weeks, and full-scale AI systems take 3-6 months. Suresh provides regular updates and maintains transparent communication throughout the development process.

Suresh has extensive experience across multiple industries including healthcare (diagnostic tools, patient risk assessment), fintech (fraud detection, risk modeling), e-commerce (recommendation systems, customer analytics), legal tech (document analysis, contract review), and more.

Suresh specializes in RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems, building intelligent chatbots with vector databases like Pinecone, implementing LLM-powered applications using OpenAI and Groq, and creating custom AI agents for business automation.

Suresh provides end-to-end AI solutions from initial consultation and requirements gathering, through design and architecture planning, to development and testing, deployment and integration, and ongoing maintenance and support.
